lender.name: CARLOS DANIEL
lender.occupation: ESTUDIANTE, TRABAJO MEDIO TIEMPO Y TENGO UN CDMOVI
lender.loan_because: quiero superarme con mi negocio tengo un disco movil y quisiera tener de nuevo la discoteca pero ahora en mi propio local, gracias necesito un apoyo de alguien que crea en la juventud emprendedora. Dios lo bendiga
lender.occupational_info: mi trabajo es el disco movil los fines de semena, trabajo de lunes a viernes en una empresa de electrodomesticos, estudio tambien, es dificil pero las ganas de superacion es mas, solo les pido que alguien me de un impulso para salir adelante, gracias de antemano a la persona que lo pueda hacer. No es mentira, tengo muchas metas en mi vida ayudame a lograrlo

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: Back in the 1960's I was a Peace Corps Volunteer in Ivory Coast so I have a strong link to West Africa. I know how hard the people work to care for their families & how much they need help.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a dentist. I take care of all the financial transactions, and also answer phones and make appointments for patients.

lender.name: Chase
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs a helping hand at some point in their lives. This is an organization that I trust to direct my hand to the right people.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying to be a doctor.

lender.name: Emma
lender.loan_because: I want to help out.
lender.occupational_info: I am in 9th grade and I go to school every day.

lender.name: Carlos & Katia
lender.loan_because: We like to help people to achieve a better life.

lender.name: Molly
lender.loan_because: I want to help empower and change the lives of those who work hard but still are less fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: Currently I am involved with managing data and information for an international mining company.

lender.name: Erika
lender.loan_because: people need people.
lender.occupational_info: I am a mom, a cook, a housekeeper, a secretary for my husband, and board member, and a bartender!

lender.name: Darcy & Heather
lender.loan_because: We care about people who are trying to succeed yet just need a little help to have a chance at it.
lender.occupational_info: Darcy works in a big office managing a group of 15 people while Heather works casually as a nurse administering vacinations to school children and community members.

lender.name: Yasmin
lender.loan_because: I care about Public Health and Human Rights for all.
lender.occupational_info: Premedical undergraduate student at the University of Richmond with a passion for International Health.

lender.name: Dylan
lender.loan_because: I think microloans are a fantastic way to help the developing world economy.
lender.occupational_info: I program web applications using languages such as PHP, Javascript, and Actionscript.

lender.name: Donald
lender.loan_because: it makes more sense to pull someone up, than push them down.

lender.name: Scott Tudehope
lender.loan_because: this is my way of helping to make an effective contribution to others. I also do it because I am angry about what the World Bank has done to Third World nations, and angry that greedy bankers and "financiers" think that they are somehow superior to to the rest of us. Canadian author David C. Korten and I are taking a stand, as are you who are reading this. I also thank Rotary Clubs worldwide for making similar differences in the lives of everyday people. I particularly salute Rotoplasty, which began in 1992 in San Francisco. Together we can truly make a difference in children's lives.
lender.occupational_info: I grade high school English papers all day long...snore....in Tracy, California.

lender.name: Jan
lender.loan_because: I think it is the right thing to do
lender.occupational_info: I work for the national parks in the United States, trying to protect the environment so it will be better for future generations.

lender.name: Cheryl & Brian
lender.loan_because: My husband always says to me, "You always want to try to save the world". Well, I may not be able to accomplish that, but using KIVA definitely gives you an opportunity to help.
lender.occupational_info: I own my own wellness marketing company. Nutritional and dietary supplements to provide a healthy lifestyle.

lender.name: Pat
lender.loan_because: I am where I am today because of the hard work my Mother did in order to help me through school.
lender.occupational_info: I am a certified public accountant. I work with many non profit organizations.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Chris & Linda
lender.loan_because: There is so much need and I'm able to help.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: Other people in the world need some help sometimes too!
lender.occupational_info: I sell automobiles using the Internet

lender.name: Kate
lender.loan_because: i can
lender.occupational_info: i study and do homework

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: There is such a huge imbalance of resouces in the world that it's criminal to sit by and ignore people who have less fortunate backgrounds, especially when they're making such an effort to improve their lot.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a store and am hoping to one day own my own business.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: John
lender.occupation: Web Design, SEO & Domain Name Sales
lender.loan_because: It's a simple yet highly effective way to help others. And aren't we on this Earth to help others? I sure think so!
lender.occupational_info: I build web sites and help my clients get customers to those sites to build their businesses. I also buy and sell domain names and run a number of other web sites including HumanHealing.com and many more.

lender.name: Faith
lender.loan_because: I want to support women who have the insight, the courage and the resolve to better life for their families and communities. I believe successful women gain respect in their communities and could become the leaders there.
lender.occupational_info: Teacher of young children. Teacher of teachers. Mediator - facilitates the resolution of conflicts

lender.name: Cheryl
lender.loan_because: it is a wonderful opportunity to help those who are helping themselves. It shows how small the world has become.

lender.name: Patricia and Ross
lender.loan_because: We decided the money we would normally spend on Christmas presents this year could be better used helping others.

lender.name: platedlizard
lender.loan_because: it's nice helping humans improve their lives. not everyone can spend all day perched on a tree and soaking up the sun, after all. my human says this the right thing to do, and she's the one who buys the papaya.
lender.occupational_info: i'm actually an iguana, but my owner had some plated lizards as well, hence the name! my owner is actually a student, she's going to be dental assistant.

lender.name: Eight Cousins Books
lender.loan_because: Others have been generous with us. Time to pass it along.
lender.occupational_info: Independent booksellers, especially for children.

lender.name: Bis
lender.loan_because: KIVA works !!

lender.name: Carpenter Family
lender.loan_because: We want to make the world a better place, and we believe everyone deserves a chance to make their life better. We are so blessed and want to assist others who need a helping hand.

lender.name: Benjamin
lender.occupational_info: study biochem

lender.name: Hassan
lender.loan_because: It helps people grow and become even more productive members of the community eventually helping others out
lender.occupational_info: My work involves looking for new business opportunities for our companies products in the vehicle handsfree, Voice recognition, ecall and telematics field. I also like to volunteer in elementary schools about everyday economics and business

lender.name: Michael Talve
lender.loan_because: I believe microfinance is the best way to help the poorest folks on earth prosper.
lender.occupational_info:
Fun, exciting and enjoyable...
I market a brand of bar soap and other personal care products that I have spent several months developing.
We hope to purchase raw materials/ingredients for our products from KIVA borrowers in developing countries; in turn, I would like to help these borrowers develop and grow their businesses by partnering with our company, VIVO Natural Products.
The brand is appropriately named: VIVO- meaning ALIVE, is how our products will make you feel when you use them. More importantly, VIVO represents the ingredients we use to make each bar of soap. Keeping the entrepreneurial spirit ALIVE is a very important part of my agenda!
Also, check out FIJI Water @ www.FIJIwater.com - it is a fantastic company and that I am fortunate to be involved with!

lender.name: Dharmesh
lender.loan_because: Faith in humanity

lender.name: antonio
lender.whereabouts: san luis potosi san luis potosi

lender.name: Amjad
lender.loan_because: What Goes around comes around, and Do unto others what you like others to do unto you!
lender.occupational_info: Helping people hear better with a human touch.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: My own life lacks meaning at times. Someone can probably use my money better than myself.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: it's my responsibility!
lender.occupational_info: I research stocks in the technology space.

lender.name: Susanne
lender.loan_because: Such a small amount can make a very big difference.

lender.name: aaron
lender.loan_because: Sometimes I need money and I know that it is tough to get it and I know that there are people in different parts of the world like in my beautiful PERU that suffer to get a meal for their children. $25.00 is about half tank of gas. Somewhere else it can be a month's worth of food!!!
lender.occupational_info: I help salespeople to be successful.

lender.name: martina
lender.loan_because: It makes me happy to help people who are trying to improve their lives.

lender.name: Marian
lender.loan_because: Everyone wants the opportunity to take care of their family because put simply, no one wants a hand out. This is an opportunity to support women who want to take care of their families and better their communities. There is nothing I can think of that is better than that.

lender.name: Yellowleaf
lender.loan_because: ....because it would be totally embarrassing if I told my son to be generous and I don't do it myself.
lender.occupational_info: I help people.

lender.name: Denise
lender.loan_because: during Christmas which is a time for giving, I couldn't think of what I could possibly get for my friends and family that have everything they need. So I thought why not give a gift that could keep on giving to others around the world that are not as fortunate as us. I love the fact that I can see how my gifts are growing and bettering others lives all over the world.

lender.name: The Blackmon Family
lender.loan_because: We can and we should!

lender.name: Jenny
lender.occupational_info: I Sell Homes.

lender.name: Terrie
lender.loan_because: It feels good to help those trying to help themselves honestly.

lender.name: Walter
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: Compulsive community activist: I see needs, and try to be of use in meeting them, where I am able.

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: I hope that lending a hand to others will help make the world a better place for everyone. I believe that Kiva is a true incarnation of compassionate conservatism.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a pharmacy and deal with people's medications.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: This is a great way to help others help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Telecommunications network maintainer

lender.name: Rocco and Robin
lender.loan_because: We like the concept of individuals helping individuals with a clear goal as well as knowing who we are directly helping to realize a dream.
lender.occupational_info: We are involved in international sales and marketing of industrial automation products

lender.name: Javier
lender.loan_because: I like helping people.
lender.occupational_info: I like to be creative and design clothes for people.

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: its important to help other people stand up on their own.
lender.occupational_info: I sell hearing aids to people that need the service. I help people hear the "world of sound".

lender.name: kenny
lender.loan_because: one act of kindness at a time...

lender.name: Katherine
lender.loan_because: I have been greatly blessed and giving someone a loan is a way that I can pass on the blessings.
lender.occupational_info: to make positive impact

lender.name: MAKE Fund
lender.loan_because: we want to work to help those less fortunate - cliche but true.
lender.occupational_info: My wife and I are both teachers. Our two daughters, Kate (17) and Emily (12), have been involved throughout their lives with a variety of self-started charitable activities.

lender.name: Harish
lender.loan_because: I was fortunate enough to have received oppurtunities to get educated and make my dreams come true. This is my way of saying thank you to life and trying my bit to empower poeple and make a positive difference in somebody's life, I believe that ...We are the world ...we are the children ...we are the ones who can make a brighter day ...so lets start giving ....One day, may be I can become a field partner.
lender.occupational_info: I have spent my entire career in designing , developing and auditing business software applications. Lately, I have been involved with Auditing and Risk Management side of Information Technology.

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: I lived in Africa for 5 years and visited refugee camps on Cambodian border during the Khmer Rouge massacres. My mother got her help up and I believe that low-income people, especially female entrepreneurs, need access to credit to make their way out of poverty. We are lucky to participate in even a small way.
lender.occupational_info: Computer manufacturer

lender.name: Shirley
lender.loan_because: What a great way to let someone across the world, know you care.

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: As a young entrepreneur I believe it is essential to help people achieve their dreams. This is especially true in developing economies. This is my way of giving back.
lender.occupational_info: Entrepreneur, President and CTO of a technology company located in the United States

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: I loan because I feel it is the right thing to do.God has blessed me and the United States in which I live.The least I can do is help others.
lender.occupational_info: I love helping others when I can.

lender.name: Liz
lender.loan_because: Abundance should be shared !
lender.occupational_info: Encourage individual empowerment to achieve maximum wellness.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I want to help woman in other countries to be successful and to improve the quality of their lives.

lender.name: Guitard
lender.loan_because: I have been very fortunate in my life and I want to give back.

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: I like to encourage people who are motivated to start their own business but need some help.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a bank.

lender.name: Valerie
lender.loan_because: I want to be an agent of social change and a role model for my students.

lender.name: Yolanda
lender.loan_because: I was born in the Dominican Republic and am very blessed to have come to the United States and benefit from the great opportunities that this country as to offer. I support women of courage, who with limited qualifications set out to better themselves, thier families and communities.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: Small gestures by individuals can make the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I play with my favorite toys.

lender.name: Liam
lender.loan_because: I can't think of a reason I shouldn't. I've been active on Kiva for 3 years now and I will spend 2010 inviting more people to join.

lender.name: Diane
lender.loan_because: it makes sense to help others help themselves.

lender.name: Judy & Rod
lender.loan_because: Everyone can help in some way.

lender.name: Bryan Kelley
lender.loan_because: People simply need help. If one doesn't step up to do it who will?
lender.occupational_info: I am retired due to a disability. I used to be a mechanical technician running a manufacturing production line for General Mills.

lender.name: The Brand Ninja
lender.occupation: President & CEO of The Brand Ninja
lender.loan_because: I would like to give someone else the opportunity to be wiser with my money than I am -- in hopes they change the world and discover their dreams in the process.
lender.occupational_info: I work with people to help them build their businesses by understanding and building strong relationships with their customers.

lender.name: Will
lender.loan_because: We have to support each other in times of need to make the world a better place.

lender.name: Annie
lender.loan_because: of karma. Someone once helped me out and now it is my turn to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I work for Veoh Networks, Inc. I also serve on the Board of Trustees of Smith College - the largest women's college in the United States - and firmly believe in enpowering women for lives of distinction.

lender.name: Julie & Eddie
lender.loan_because: We are fortunate to be able to
lender.occupational_info: I became a nurse because i wanted to help people.

lender.name: Gloria
lender.loan_because: I wish to help people become successful finanically so that they may have better lives
lender.occupational_info: coaching women to be successful business women.

lender.name: etienne
lender.loan_because:
The future of humanity, begins today.
Caritas.
lender.occupational_info: Supportive, insights, caring - to and with people.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: there's no reason not to.
lender.occupational_info: I'm currently studying Business and Political Science at Sacred Heart University. I work closely with the ONE Campaign and (RED).

lender.name: Jenn
lender.loan_because: I want to give others opportunities to achieve their highest level of self-worth. I also want to know that my money is going towards worthwhile investments and not administrative costs of some "charity" organization.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of my home and my family.

lender.name: Izzi and Howie
lender.loan_because: We believe that helping people better themselves helps all of us.

lender.name: Hayes
lender.loan_because: God has blessed us and are happy to pass along that blessing to others.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a sales territory for a large software organization based in the USA. My wife is a private chef and our daughter is the boss.

lender.name: Teri
lender.loan_because: it really makes a difference--helping people to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work with a church to help them try to live faithfully, to work toward the kingdom of God, to do justice and to love kindness.

lender.name: jennifer
lender.loan_because: I want to help other people achieve their goals.
lender.occupational_info: I teach visual communication - poster design, logo design, ad design, web site design.

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: I agree with Kiva.org and their mission statement. I wish I was given the same chance to prove myself. It is good reading all the success stories!
lender.occupational_info: Beer and wine inventory sales for local retail establishments.

lender.name: Juan Carlos
lender.loan_because: we're blessed to be living in America.
lender.occupational_info: I work on large-scale internet projects for very large companies globally.

lender.name: Donnie
lender.loan_because: I think it is a great Idea to help people that are trying to help theirself.
lender.occupational_info: I service Office Copier Equipment

lender.name: Joyce Walters
lender.loan_because: It is important to give back to others from the abundance in our lives. It gives me so much joy to help others and I'm amazed at how responsible people are in paying back their loans. It seems every time I log into Kiva.org I have money to re-lend. My husband and I give Kiva gift certificates to everyone in our family for Christmas. That is the true spirit of the season - giving back to others.
lender.occupational_info: I provide consulting to businesses, non-profits and affiliations to engage more business leaders in supporting education.

lender.name: yvonne
lender.loan_because: I want to help small scale entrepreneurs.
lender.occupational_info: I help companies find solutions to business related problems so they can perform better and make a profit.

lender.name: Jack
lender.loan_because: People need to help each other, and micro loans are a way of doing that with dignity and accountability.
lender.occupational_info: I help people establish and grow their businesses.

lender.name: Jeffrey
lender.occupational_info: Furniture and Cabinet Maker

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: I've been an entrepreneur and a small business owner so I understand how important it is to have access to capital. I also want to help anyone who is working in the alcohol business.
lender.occupational_info: I select and manage different spirits (gin, vodka, rum, tequila) for a distributor to sell.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I believe we are put on earth to help each other.
lender.occupational_info: I help people achieve a healthy lifestyle.

lender.name: Don
lender.loan_because: It's always great to encourage entrepreneurship and innovative thinking. It's also rewarding to see my contributions put to good use.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of patients in the hospital.

lender.name: Max & Milo
lender.loan_because: It feels good to help someone, who is just trying to make an honest living to support their family.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves an opportunity

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I feel loaning is an effective way to help create a society that one day can become self-sustaining. Loaning through Kiva empowers women which I feel is extremely important in a country where women are trageted.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student

lender.name: Tricia
lender.loan_because: I can!
lender.occupational_info: Every step, no matter how small, eventually gets you a long way.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: It's a great way to help!
lender.occupational_info: I clean up environmental damage.

lender.name: Kendal
lender.loan_because: I believe we should all help eachother whenever and however we can.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: When I was a new single parent, wonderful strangers came through for me. Now it is my turn to help out a stranger in need.
lender.occupational_info: I am a single parent who cares for two children and distributes winter wear throughout Colorado.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: I think we should all be kind, help others, and give back to society. Helping others gives me the opportunity to feel good inside and pay it forward.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a hospital and prevent people from feeling pain during surgery.

lender.name: PALMA
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the lives of others.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a full commissioned sales consultant in the furniture industry.

lender.name: Elix & Nick
lender.loan_because: We want to provide a helping hand so that others can realize a bright future of their own making. We believe that giving someone an opportunity to be successful is one of the best gifts you can give. We hope to make a difference.- Elix and Nick
lender.occupational_info: Computer Software Systems designer

lender.name: Annette
lender.loan_because: I think it is one of the best ways to make a difference in the world.
lender.occupational_info: Helping people find information about natural health and traditional medicine.

lender.name: Farley
lender.occupation: Advance warning device of any incomiming human.

lender.name: Jamie
lender.loan_because: One person can change the world ..

lender.name: sudarshan
lender.loan_because: human beings around the world have amazing talents and ambition. Often it is opportunity that prevents these gifts from being realized. Kiva is a great way to make a difference that can change the world one person at a time. I thank them for their creativity, vision and allowing me to share in a small way.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: People everywhere deserve a chance to work hard and provide a decent life for themselves and those they love.

lender.name: Audrie
lender.loan_because: Femconnexion wants to help where they can - to assist women across the world to be self sufficient through their own efforts for better independency.
lender.occupational_info: Connecting women across the Australia, New Zealand & the world to better awareness of the resources available to them.

lender.name: mandeep
lender.loan_because: It seems like a great way to enable people all over the world to help empower themselves to a better way of life, in sustainable ways.
lender.occupational_info: I look at the stars (and galaxies) in the sky and try to figure out how our Universe came to be, and what will happen to it in the future..!

lender.name: Tammy
lender.loan_because: I want to help people stand on their own two feet.
lender.occupational_info: I make sure the health insurance system works properly for the members who use it.

lender.name: Megan
lender.loan_because: I believe that all people deserve a shot at success. If I can help make this a reality for someone, then why not?
lender.occupational_info: I teach highschool Algebra in inner city Los Angeles

lender.name: Ray
lender.occupational_info: I sell TV's

lender.name: Megan
lender.loan_because: "He who waits to do a great deal of good at once, will never do anything." Samuel Johnson

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I want to help people less fortunate than myself

lender.name: Shanon
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me in many ways and I want to extend that to others.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: to be able to bring some hope into someone elses life is such a privilege
lender.occupational_info: I work in a Hospice in a small town in New Zealand caring for the dying. This work makes one realise how precious every day is.

lender.name: Anh
lender.loan_because: microfinance clearly changes lives
lender.occupational_info: find your balance, value, and purpose. continue to create, enrich, and cultivate the life you want

lender.name: Sherilyn
lender.loan_because: I loan through Kiva because I like to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a full-time disabled wife and mom who cyberschools two children ages 13 and 9.

lender.name: Gadling
lender.loan_because: Giving back to the communities where we've traveled
lender.occupational_info: Travel

lender.name: PeeBee
lender.loan_because: I think helping livelihood sustainability is a key way to promote development and human rights.
lender.occupational_info: I work for CBM, a Christian organisation helping people with disability in the poorest countries in the world

lender.name: Neil Budgen
lender.loan_because: It is a pleasure and a privilege to play a part in helping someone with their dream. Some will fail, but those that are prepared to have a go will face many challenges and mere money should not be one of them.
lender.occupational_info: I help independent business owners develop their vision and achieve their dreams. From start up to exit I support them and help them understand the business of business. When I see them smiling, I know I‚Äôm doing a good job!

lender.name: Rob
lender.loan_because: I can, and therefore I should.

lender.name: Kristine
lender.loan_because: Growing up in Honduras, I learned the importance of giving back to the community at an early age. My father first taught me about microfinance when I was twelve. He explained that it worked by loaning money to people who otherwise would not have the resources to earn a living. It‚Äôs not just about giving; the loans empower people to expand their small businesses, learn about financial responsibility, and lend a hand to their neighbors in similar situations. A little help really does go a long way.

lender.name: Maggie
lender.loan_because: I can cycle my one loan many times!

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: I want to help people to help themselves. These people are not asking for us to give them money, they are asking us to loan them money. The difference is monumental.
lender.occupational_info: I'm going to college right now to learn how to build computers.

lender.name: Wendy and Myro
lender.loan_because: It seems such an easy thing to do that has such a big impact.
lender.occupational_info: I supply computers and IT services to businesses. Myro keeps us all supplied with drawings.

lender.name: Char
lender.loan_because: I am blessed to have my own successful business and want to share, inspire and enjoy watching others gain their independence too!
lender.occupational_info: Beauty Industry, Screenwriter, Digital Media Artist

lender.name: Violeta
lender.loan_because: It is such a practical way to help, and I can identify with it. Despite the privilege of living where I live, we're all trying to earn a crust. I also love the stories of the lenders. They show us that they are humans, not "issues".

lender.name: Lynne
lender.loan_because: A small amount of money from me can mean so much to someone out in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am an older woman, retired now, but formerly engaged in a career in education.

lender.name: jeff
lender.loan_because: Kiva loans will help make the world a fairer and more equal place.
lender.occupational_info: We help companies manage their business more effectively.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I am an entrepreneur and business man at heart.
lender.occupational_info: I help manage water resources in a location where water is scarce.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: I can!

lender.name: Tobi
lender.loan_because: I'm able to. Some money hopefully makes a little difference.

lender.name: Manishkumar
lender.loan_because:
I would like to make difference & would like to make my life worth on this earth!
There is no other happiness greater than helping others in need!

lender.name: Antonella
lender.loan_because: I think that micro-credit and fair trade are the best way to help people
lender.occupational_info: I help making computers and the web easier to use for people of all kinds

lender.name: Chrys and Gayle
lender.loan_because: I am a capitalist and entrepreneur.
lender.occupational_info: Retired marketing executive and CEO of international luxury goods companies.

lender.name: Tricia
lender.loan_because: I care, and my sister inspires me to be more aware.

lender.name: Teresa
lender.loan_because: "Small opportunities are often the beginning of great enterprises." Quoted By: Demosthenes, Greek Statesman & Orator, 384 - 322 B.C.

lender.name: silvo
lender.loan_because: i was poor once
lender.occupational_info: i just rent out rooms or the complete house

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: I have it to loan, Im not terribly rich but I do have more than many people in this World.
lender.occupational_info: Plumbing Heating and Cooling contractor. Run office have 7 people working for me

lender.name: Carmine
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of helping people to help themselves. It is great to see people empowered to make a better life for their families. I hope the IMF, the World Bank and the G7 are paying attention!!
lender.occupational_info: I repair electronic equipment at customer location...

lender.name: Michaela
lender.loan_because: I am achieving my goals, and now it's time to help others achieve theirs.

lender.name: Sharon
lender.loan_because: I have worked on service projects in Kenya through my university's Int'l Affairs program for grandparents raising AIDS orphans. I have seen first hand how a little goes a long way to help older people in developing countries.
lender.occupational_info: I am a college professor, and I teach and do research about older people and their families. We try to learn more about ways to support older people in the U.S. and Africa.

lender.name: Pc Mechanix
lender.loan_because: i was retrench from work due to slow business at my work place. So i started my small pc fix it shop to support my famliy. I need to put in more pc parts and other relate items. Because i m a small business, all the banks in Malaysia won't give the chance for me to get a loan. Please help me, i m in a jammed.
lender.occupational_info: I have a small computer store that with limited resources due to limited space and pc parts to serve my customer. I m trying to make a living for my wife and 3 kids that still in school. My wife works at a small hotel near my hometown as a clerk. She had to work from 9am to 10pm every day. And i have to bring my children after school directly to my shop so they can be monitored and fed. For the future of my famliy, please help.

lender.name: Brian and Christy
lender.loan_because: I want to help those in need that are ambitious and self starters
lender.occupational_info: I help insure clients against rainy days in their lives. Protect their assets and help them build wealth.

lender.name: Donna
lender.loan_because: I think this is a very worthwhile way to help people. I would not have been able to buy my home without loans
lender.occupational_info: I am the physician director of a Head Injury rehabilitation clinic and I consult on the Neurotrauma service of a major downtown hospital in Toronto Canada

lender.name: Cyrel
lender.loan_because: i want to add 2 computer for my internet cafe business.
lender.occupational_info: Right now i have 3 computer for my internet cafe bussiness planning to buy another 1 through the help of kiva.I do maintenance,servicing and troubleshooting of my own pc.

lender.name: Keri
lender.loan_because: I have spent the majority of my working life struggling to make ends meet. I am finally in a place that I am able to help out others.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English at a university in Korea.

lender.name: Suresh
lender.loan_because: I care to share something good in my life and spread the word on KIVA to others by example.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a large multinational company Siemens and we make medical equipment to detect cancer, and other major diseases.

lender.name: Ariel
lender.loan_because: Like many other Kiva members, I believe in sharing my blessings and in helping other human beings in need. I am sure if you ask anyone on the street they would agree that ending extreme poverty is a worthy cause, we are just doing something about it...
lender.occupational_info: I manage people and other resources in aviation related topics.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: Thank God for abundance! We are so blessed, we wanted others to be elevated and to achieve their dreams. I've been a small business owner before and love that others are in business for themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a High Performing Team that builds and run web sites for the University of Richmond in Richmond, Virginia. I provide pro-bono Life Skills and Career Coaching and am active at all levels of First Robotics.

lender.name: Marvin
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I help to create opportunities around the country.

lender.name: EDIT.COM
lender.loan_because: We are a start-up venture and understand the importance of giving entrepreneurs the help and capital they need to succeed. We appreciate the confidence our investors have in us and we want to help other entrepreneurs achieve their goals.
lender.occupational_info: We are a website maintenance company for small businesses... We turn website visitors into clients.

lender.name: Alan, Paula and Lloyd
lender.loan_because: each of us blossoms when we feel someone has faith in our abilities.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: Not everyone in the world is as fortunate as me. I have a loving wife, two incredible kids, a roof over my head and a great job. Everyone should be as lucky as me.
lender.occupational_info: I help design and build grocery stores.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: It is good for us and it is good for the world.

lender.name: Maxine
lender.loan_because: it makes sense to me
lender.occupational_info: I teach people to scuba dive to help protect the marine environment

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: I've always liked Kiva's way of using the net to bring the worlds we live in a little closer together.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a literary agent - I sell manuscripts to publishers, and make money for authors.

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: an injury to one is an injury to all.
lender.occupational_info: I listen to rich people complain all day and apologize for things that are not my fault.

lender.name: Kristin
lender.loan_because: it a wonderful opportunity to help someone succeed.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I've been blessed.
lender.occupational_info: I train people who teach small children.

lender.name: Arnar
lender.loan_because: I think this is a great effort. This is help in it's finest form and I am a great believer that such a project makes the world a better place.

lender.name: Blueprint PR
lender.occupational_info: BPR is a public relations firm in Canada‚Äôs capital, focussed on communications counsel, implementation, and project management for NGOs and government organizations.

lender.name: Schubert
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to be able to do this.
lender.occupational_info: I was a teacher. I'm now a writer, fisher and cook.

lender.name: Rick and Carole
lender.loan_because: It's a great way to make a big impact with small amounts of money. It's personal, which we also like.

lender.name: Liane
lender.loan_because: It feels good to help others who really need it.

lender.name: Heidi
lender.loan_because: I hope that all people can enjoy at least the luxuries and comforts that I take for granted everyday.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: Others have helped me, so I want to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I teach courses in consumer behavior and environmentally-sustainable business

lender.name: Roxana
lender.loan_because: each entrepreneur on this site is a perseverance super hero to me. They teach us so much about what you can do with hard work and hope, and we owe it to them to give back and support their dreams.

lender.name: Brunsick ~ Legacy
lender.loan_because: In lieu of inter-office gift giving, this loan fund has been arranaged. We will continue to loan once the funds are paid!
lender.occupational_info: We assist people in buying and selling their houses or land.

lender.name: Esther
lender.loan_because: It is so much fun and very easy
lender.occupational_info: I help people enjoy their work and keep getting better at it. This way the organisation can also grow and make more profit. Our company makes beautiful books.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I want to actively support women to achieve economic independence, to help build a better future for their children, their families and their community.
lender.occupational_info: Helping to prevent malnutrition and disease through dietary advice and support.

lender.name: J.Deimling/K.Scrimger
lender.loan_because: Grace and Zara are making a loan on behalf of their amazing teachers. Joyeux Noel!!
lender.occupational_info: M. Deimling teaches grade 1 french immersion and Mme. Scrimger teaches grade 4 french immersion.

lender.name: Ray & Becky
lender.loan_because: I would like to see people better their standard of living through their own industry.
lender.occupational_info: I manage the construction of church buildings in the Southeast United States.

lender.name: Frank
lender.loan_because: Because there's no good reason not to.

lender.name: Molly
lender.loan_because: every little bit counts... help doesn't have to be showy.

lender.name: Joana
lender.whereabouts: Vila Nova de Gaia Vila Nova de Gaia

lender.name: JenPW
lender.loan_because: this is a small way to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I chase small children all day. :)

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: I can see the difference my contributions make in the world.

lender.name: Shannon
lender.loan_because: I believe in people and their dreams for a better life.

lender.name: Shane
lender.loan_because: I enjoy being able to give someone else the oportunity to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I install sprinkler systems for fire protection in homes and buildings.

lender.name: Collin
lender.loan_because: As an entrepreneur, I want to encourage other entrepreneurs who want to pursue the dream of working for themselves, no matter what the culture.
lender.occupational_info: I enable businesses to conduct their business on the internet with customers all over the world.

lender.name: Blair
lender.loan_because: it's a fun and rewarding
lender.occupational_info: i make deals, break hearts, and take names

lender.name: bernadine
lender.loan_because: I am interested in helping this grandmother because I to am a grandmother.
lender.occupational_info: nurse, church patron

lender.name: Cynthia Malaran
lender.loan_because: I know what it is like to need just a little more money to make your dreams come true. And I know what it is like to work hard and achieve my dreams. I loan from my site "Watching the Changes" at www.malaran.com/wtc. Check it out. ;-)
lender.occupational_info: www.malaran.com

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: I want to help
lender.occupational_info: I develop custom software for financial services companies.

lender.name: Colin
lender.loan_because: Small amounts of charity can make an enormous impact on the lives of others.
